trans-unit.source: Represents a cryptographic object identifier.
trans-unit.target: 代表密碼編譯物件識別項。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Cryptographic object identifiers consist of a value/name pair.
trans-unit.target: 密碼編譯物件識別碼/名稱值配對所組成。

trans-unit.source: If one property in a pair is set to a known value, the other property is updated automatically to a corresponding value.
trans-unit.target: 如果配對中的一個屬性設定成已知的值，其他屬性會自動更新成對應的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value%2A> property is set to "1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4", the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName%2A> property, which is localized, is set automatically to "Secure Email".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value%2A>屬性設定為"1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4"，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName%2A>已當地語系化的屬性會自動設定為 [安全電子郵件]。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The object identifier information to use to create the new object identifier.
trans-unit.target: 用以建立新物件識別項的物件識別項資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 物件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor copies the values of an existing <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> object to a new object.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式複製現有的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>新物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> 類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="oid" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="oid" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object identifier.
trans-unit.target: 物件識別項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> class using a string value of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 物件的字串值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor copies the values of an existing <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> object to a new object.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式複製現有的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>新物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The dotted number of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 識別項具小數點的數字。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 識別項的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> class using the specified value and friendly name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值和易記名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used to copy the values of an existing <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可用來針對現有的值複製<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>物件。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the Oid value is not recognized, the `value` and `friendlyName` parameters are not verified to determine if they correspond to each other.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果無法辨識的 Oid 值、`value`和`friendlyName`參數不會驗證以判斷它們對應到彼此。

trans-unit.source: This is because there are object identifiers that the .NET Framework does not recognize, although an application may be able to interpret them.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為有物件識別碼，.NET Framework 無法辨識，即使應用程式可以將它們解譯。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the friendly name of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定識別項的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 識別項的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: If one value of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> property is set to a known value, the other value of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> property is updated automatically to a corresponding value.
trans-unit.target: 如果的其中一個值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>屬性設定成已知的值，其他值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>屬性會自動更新成對應的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName%2A> property is set to "Secure Email", the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value%2A> property is set automatically to "1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName%2A>屬性設定為 [安全電子郵件]，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value%2A>屬性會自動設定為"1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4"。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> 類別。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 識別項的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: The group to search in.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中搜尋的群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object from an OID friendly name by searching the specified group.
trans-unit.target: 藉由搜尋指定的群組，從 OID 易記名稱建立 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the specified OID.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定之 OID 的物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="friendlyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="friendlyName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The OID was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 OID。

trans-unit.source: The OID value.
trans-unit.target: OID 值。

trans-unit.source: The group to search in.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中搜尋的群組。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object by using the specified OID value and group.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 OID 值和 群組，建立 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> 物件的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="oidValue" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="oidValue" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name for the OID value was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 OID 值的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the dotted number of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定識別項中以英文句號連接的數字。

trans-unit.source: The dotted number of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 識別項具小數點的數字。

trans-unit.source: If one value of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> property is set to a known value, the other value of an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> property is updated automatically to a corresponding value.
trans-unit.target: 如果的其中一個值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>屬性設定成已知的值，其他值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid>屬性會自動更新成對應的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value%2A> property is set to "1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4", the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName%2A> property is set automatically to "Secure Email".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.Value%2A>屬性設定為"1.3.6.1.5.5.7.3.4"，<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid.FriendlyName%2A>屬性會自動設定為 [安全電子郵件]。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid> 類別。
